lines.text:
[reading ID]
Joseph P. Brenner. What's the "P" stand for?
Pussy.
You should not drink and bake!
He molested, murdered and mutilated her.

[Splashes red paint in a gambler's face having dragged him along a table]
This is what you're going to look like dead!
[grabs gambler's head to face a mirror]
The only way you'll ever end up lying next to me, Max, is if we're run down by the same car.
Losing improves your character.
What do you think I look like, Dirty Harry?
Max, if you're the best there is, the wheel would never have been invented.
You remember my son Blair?
Yeah. We went to a few ball games together. He joined the bureau, didn't he?
Yeah.
How is he?

[pauses]
Dead.
[Taking off Kaminski's shirt]
Oh... my... God!
You're under arrest.
For what?
Impersonating a human being.
Because of you a lot of people are dead. And now it's your turn.
I'll get you a nice eight by ten.
Keep it. I'm not sentimental.
Get in my way again and I'll kill ya.
I hope your not your mother's only child.
You gave me a Raw Deal.
Look, I know with you its personal, but we're both after the same thing - justice. Right, Harry? Justice?
Fuck justice!
When I want to make friends, I'll go to summer camp.
This must be when they mean by poetic justice.
Hi. When was the last time you had a good piss?
He has good taste in jewelry. But you have bad taste in men.

[Holding an informant in front of a mirror]
So you wanna be a witness? Witness This!
[shoots said informant in the head]
Good evening, sir.
Down.
There is no down.
Hey, I'm not a cop. I'm a player.
Mr. Rocca thinks you would make a worthwhile addition to our various endeavors.
I like to think so.
Oh, you're a thinker.
Sometimes. Not enough to get me into any trouble.
From what we know, you don't stay anyplace too long.
If you're not part of an organization that can protect you, moving around is the next best thing.
He's looking for a home.
[Luigi get his lighter to light his cigar before smoking]
You kill anybody, Joey?
Yeah.
More than one?
Three. You want names and addresses?
[Luigi turns off his lighter and puts it down his desk and get up]
Smart, I like. Smart-ass, I don't. All right. Forget it. Go back to the party. I want to talk to Mr. Rocca.
Nice meeting you.
[Joey Brenner leaves the office and heads back to the party. Luigi is going to talk to Mr. Rocca private]
I don't know.
[But the door didn't closed tight enough, so Luigi closed the door]
You don't let him in too far, too fast. Give him a little time to impress us. If he doesn't, we'll use him for something dirty and dump him in the pit.
[Luigi grab and looking of the little girl in the photo]
Cute, huh?
[sighed]
What a doll.
Magic? Or magnet?

[Knocking on the door here at Patrovita's private home office]
Come in.
[the door has opened to welcome someone as a guess]
Joey Brenner, Luigi Patrovita.
My pleasure.
[Luigi is very impressive]
